column1: }}'''Yávien''' was the only daughter and oldest child of [[Nolondil]], the brother of [[Tar-Amandil]], [[King of Númenor]]. Almost nothing is known of her life.<ref>{{UT
In [[Quenya]] her name means "Fruit-maiden" (from ''[[yávë]]'' "fruit" and -''[[ien]]'' = feminine suffix) or "She of the Autumn" (from ''[[yávië]]'' = "autumn" and ''-[[ien]]'').
